about_me.des: I am software test engineer with proficiency in python. I love working with networking and mobility related products.

career.netease_des: In Netease game, I learned game service system and use Python code for ops.
career.ucloud_des: In ucloud, I started to deal with servers and Linux system and use shell scripts to manage massive server.
career.college_des: On April 2014,I graduated from college and started my waited for few days to start my exciting career.
